mapper.sql: id, agentId, agentName, customName, customType, customTypeName, siteUrl, customStatus, bossName, cardType, cardTypeName, cardNum, companyTel, companyFax, regDatetime, country, province, city, area, companyAddress, agentCode, memo
mapper.insert: insert into as_customs (id, agentId, agentName, customName, customType, customTypeName, siteUrl, customStatus, bossName, cardType, cardTypeName, cardNum, companyTel, companyFax, regDatetime, country, province, city, area, companyAddress, memo, agentCode )values(null,#{agentId},#{agentName},#{customName}, #{customType},#{customTypeName}, #{siteUrl},#{customStatus},#{bossName}, #{cardType},#{cardTypeName},#{cardNum},#{companyTel},#{companyFax}, #{regDatetime},#{country},#{province},#{city},#{area},#{companyAddress},#{memo} ,#{agentCode}) ;
